Row.Text: Caravans gain 50% extended range. Your [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes spread the home city's Religion twice as effectively. Oil Resources are doubled.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Caravans gain 50% extended range. Your [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes spread the home city's Religion twice as effectively. Oil Resources are doubled.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]Caravans gain 50% extended range. Your [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes spread the home city's Religion twice as effectively. Oil Resources are doubled.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]Caravans gain 50% extended range. Your [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes spread the home city's Religion twice as effectively. Oil Resources are doubled.

The Bazaar is the Arabian unique Building, replacing the Market. The Bazaar provides a larger [ICON_GOLD] Gold bonus to the City than the Market, and the Civilization gains one additional copy of each Luxury Resource provided by a City possessing a Bazaar. The Bazaar also provides +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on [ICON_RES_OIL] Oil and Oases.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]The Bazaar is the Arabian unique Building, replacing the Market. The Bazaar provides a larger [ICON_GOLD] Gold bonus to the City than the Market, and the Civilization gains one additional copy of each Luxury Resource provided by a City possessing a Bazaar. The Bazaar also provides +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on [ICON_RES_OIL] Oil and Oases.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]The Bazaar is the Arabian unique Building, replacing the Market. The Bazaar provides a larger [ICON_GOLD] Gold bonus to the City than the Market, and the Civilization gains one additional copy of each Luxury Resource provided by a City possessing a Bazaar. The Bazaar also provides +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on [ICON_RES_OIL] Oil and Oases.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]The Bazaar is the Arabian unique Building, replacing the Market. The Bazaar provides a larger [ICON_GOLD] Gold bonus to the City than the Market, and the Civilization gains one additional copy of each Luxury Resource provided by a City possessing a Bazaar. The Bazaar also provides +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on [ICON_RES_OIL] Oil and Oases.

Provides 1 extra copy of each improved Luxury Resource near this City. Each source of [ICON_RES_OIL] Oil and each Oasis provides +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. The Bazaar increases the City's output of wealth more than the Market it replaces. Trade Routes other players make to a City with a Bazaar will generate an extra 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the City owner and the Trade Route owner gains an additional 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the Trade route.
